text: @edmnangagwa Nematambudziko Mr President. MHSRIP. Covid-19 knows no class, rank and status. Hence the need to Stop Corruption around COVID-19 donations. Unfortunately your family is involved in that corruption. Does ur kids feel better now with that money sitting in the bank and pple dying?
